segments.text: As I glance at the garden outside the window, itâ€™s a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything out there is so orderly and peaceful, as if nothing could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, here inside, the puddle expands with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy's determination, his little fingers stretching towards that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands patiently, her arm raised like a tiny traffic signal, waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't anyone see the danger that lurks in the shadows of this kitchen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment could quickly turn from joy to disaster in a blink of an eye.
segments.speaker: PAR
